alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 2:52PM MST until July 31 at 3:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 315 PM MST. * At 251 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Prescott, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Prescott Valley, Prescott, Yavapai Campground, Downtown Prescott, Prescott Airport, Indian Hill West Prescott, Oak Knoll Village, Prescott Gateway Mall, and Prescott Valley Event Center. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 310 and 325. State Route 89A between mile markers 318 and 323. State Route 69 between mile markers 287 and 296. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
